1.0.5.name: wordpress/google-adsense-and-hotel-booking
1.0.5.description:
English Google Adsense and Hotel Booking is a free plugin and open source software that automatically insert Google Adsense ads and or Hotel Reservation (OnlineHotel.com.br).

To make money with Google Adsense ads you just have an account with Google Adsense and earn 20% commissions on Hotel Reservations just installing this plugin.

You have full control over the ads. It is possible to control color, size, number and types of ads. You determine how many Adsense ads and how many Reservation ads you want to show.

Download

The installation and activation of this plugin constitutes acceptance of the terms of the OnlineHotel.com.br Affiliate Program that can be found in http://onlinehotel.com.br/contracts/aff_contract_en.html.

Features:
